data.name: setting_contributionfromurl_description
data.value: Wanneer er zich een geldige URL op je klembord bevindt zodra je een activiteit gaat toevoegen, zal de app vragen of de metadata van deze URL gebruikt moet worden om je activiteit deels automatisch in te vullen.

data.name: setting_apptheme_description
data.value: Deze applicatie kan zowel in een lichte als een donkere weergave gebruikt worden. Standaard neemt de app de instelling van de telefoon over. Wanneer een van beide weergaves je voorkeur heeft kan deze hier ingesteld worden.

data.name: about_why_title
data.value: Why did you build this app?

data.name: about_why_description
data.value: There has always been a need for Microsoft MVPs to manage their community activities in an easier way. The online portal works fine, but having a similar thing in your pocket to create activities on the fly is really cool. Which is what this project is for!

data.name: about_opensource_description
data.value: This app is completely open source. If you like the app, feel free to become a GitHub sponsor, buying me a digital cup of coffee a month ☕️

data.name: contribution_form_timeframememo
data.value: Your contribution submission for the July award cycle must be for community activities between April 1, 2020 to March 31, 2021. Community activities submitted from April 1st and beyond will be held for future consideration.

data.name: contributionform_activitytype_placeholder
data.value: Select the activity type that best fits this activity.

data.name: contributionform_technologyarea_placeholder
data.value: Select the technology area that is the primary focus of this activity.

data.name: contributionform_additionaltechnologyarea_placeholder
data.value: Select up to 2 additional technology areas that may also apply to this activity.

data.name: contributionform_visibility_placeholder
data.value: Select the visibility level of this activity.

data.name: setting_language_description
data.value: Don't like the language we picked for you? You can override it here.
